title: Zcalc Instructor Notes: Overview
description: These are instructor notes to support the USAFA Core Calculus courses, Math 141/142
contents:
The Project MOSAIC calculus textbook is divided into six blocks and a collection of “manifestations.” Depending on the goals for the course being taught different blocks can be included.
Preface: What is calculus?
Block 1: Introduction to functions and computing
Block 2: Foundation for modeling
Block 3: Differentiation
Block 4: Anti-differentiation and accumulation
Block 5: Linear combinations
Block 6: Dynamics
Manifestations
Operations on functions
Interpolation and splines
Optimization and constraint
Probability and evidence
Present and future value
Mechanics
